revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Eterna Forest |image = [[File:Eterna Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Eterna Forest. |tokens = 48,000 |location = On the North part of Route 205. }} '''Eterna Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 812,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly || rowspan=2| [[File:Bookworms.png|40px]] Bookworms Jack & Briana || rowspan=2|[[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Silcoon.png|40px]] Silcoon, [[File:Beautifly.png|40px]] Beautifly, [[File:Pachirisu.png|40px]] Pachirisu |- | [[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot |- | [[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple || rowspan=2| [[File:Melded_Minds_(both).png|40px]] Melded Minds Linsey & Elijah || rowspan=2|[[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra, [[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra |- | [[File:Silcoon.png|40px]] Silcoon |- | [[File:Cascoon.png|40px]] Cascoon || rowspan=2| [[File:Bug_Buds.png|40px]] Bug Buds Philip & Donald || rowspan=2|[[File:Wurmple.png|40px]] Wurmple, [[File:Cascoon.png|40px]] Cascoon, [[File:Dustox.png|40px]] Dustox, [[File:Burmy.png|40px]] Burmy (plant), [[File:Kricketune.png|40px]] Kricketune |- | [[File:Bidoof.png|40px]] Bidoof |- | [[File:Kricketot.png|40px]] Kricketot || rowspan=3| [[File:Melded_Minds_(both).png|40px]] Melded Minds Kody & Rachael || rowspan=3|[[File:Meditite.png|40px]] Meditite, [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Budew.png|40px]] Budew |- | [[File:Buneary.png|40px]] Buneary |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Alola]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
